answers.answer: Hi,You can exercise together and make sure you have an active lifestyle.  You can both get fit together.  Take up some sport  that you both will enjoy and do it together.  Jogging or triathlon may be an option?You can both go low carb together so you are both eating similar foods.You can read up on it so you also are knowlegeable.

question: We recently found out she has type II diabetes, how can I be extra supportive to her. I've already agreed to stop drinking and change my eating habits, but what else can I do???
title: My girlfriend just found out she has type II diabetes.. what can I do?
